fields.name: header
fields.desc: Sets the form section header. The section header lies above the [children] rows.

fields.name: footer
fields.desc: Sets the form section footer. The section footer lies below the [children] rows.

fields.name: margin
fields.desc: Margin around the content area of the section encapsulating [children].

fields.name: children
fields.desc: The list of rows in the section.

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: Sets the background color behind the section.
